body:
<!-- This form is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! 

If you're looking for help check [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/kubernetes) and the [troubleshooting guide](https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/debug-application-cluster/troubleshooting/).
-->

**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**:
/kind bug
> Uncomment only one, leave it on its own line: 
>
> /kind bug
> /kind feature


**What happened**:
```
root@andy-dev:/code2/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes# git checkout upstream/release-1.8
HEAD is now at 0c7e7ae... Merge pull request #60014 from cofyc/automated-cherry-pick-of-#59170-upstream-release-1.8
root@andy-dev:/code2/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes# hack/update-bazel.sh
Cloning into '/tmp/tmp.PVJt57R744/go/src/github.com/kubernetes/repo-infra'...
remote: Counting objects: 848, done.
remote: Total 848 (delta 0), reused 0 (delta 0), pack-reused 848
Receiving objects: 100% (848/848), 261.63 KiB | 0 bytes/s, done.
Resolving deltas: 100% (385/385), done.
Checking connectivity... done.
Cloning into '/tmp/tmp.PVJt57R744/go/src/github.com/bazelbuild/rules_go'...
remote: Counting objects: 9265, done.
remote: Compressing objects: 100% (26/26), done.
remote: Total 9265 (delta 8), reused 11 (delta 2), pack-reused 9237
Receiving objects: 100% (9265/9265), 2.09 MiB | 0 bytes/s, done.
Resolving deltas: 100% (5983/5983), done.
Checking connectivity... done.
# github.com/bazelbuild/rules_go/go/tools/gazelle/merger
go/tools/gazelle/merger/fix.go:88:28: too few values in struct initializer
go/tools/gazelle/merger/merger.go:491:19: too few values in struct initializer
go/tools/gazelle/merger/merger.go:495:19: too few values in struct initializer
# github.com/bazelbuild/rules_go/go/tools/gazelle/rules
go/tools/gazelle/rules/generator.go:131:16: too few values in struct initializer
go/tools/gazelle/rules/sort_labels.go:30:16: too few values in struct initializer
!!! [0227 06:04:38] Call tree:
!!! [0227 06:04:38]  1: hack/update-bazel.sh:29 kube::util::go_install_from_commit(...)
!!! Error in /code2/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/hack/lib/util.sh:568
  Error in /code2/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/hack/lib/util.sh:568. '((i<3-1))' exited with status 2
Call stack:
  1: /code2/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/hack/lib/util.sh:568 kube::util::go_install_from_commit(...)
  2: hack/update-bazel.sh:29 main(...)
Exiting with status 1
!!! [0227 06:04:38] Call tree:
!!! [0227 06:04:38]  1: hack/update-bazel.sh:29 kube::util::go_install_from_commit(...)
!!! Error in /code2/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/hack/lib/util.sh:553
  Error in /code2/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/hack/lib/util.sh:553. '((i<3-1))' exited with status 1
Call stack:
  1: /code2/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/hack/lib/util.sh:553 kube::util::go_install_from_commit(...)
  2: hack/update-bazel.sh:29 main(...)
Exiting with status 1
```

**What you expected to happen**:

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:
```
# git checkout upstream/release-1.8
# hack/update-bazel.sh
```

**Anything else we need to know?**:
"hack/update-bazel.sh" on v1.7, v1.9, v1.10 all works, only on v1.8 returns error.

**Environment**:
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`): v1.8
- Cloud provider or hardware configuration:
- OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release):
- Kernel (e.g. `uname -a`):
- Install tools:
- Others:

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

title: "hack/update-bazel.sh" with several complaints about "too few values in struct initializer" on release 1.8
